name: RO-LL
description:
Made in under 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Roll of the Dice".

How to play:

  • Use E or Z to talk.
  • Use R to reset the level.
  • Use WASD and Arrow Keys to move.
  • Use the 6-Sided Dice to combine into words.
  • Guess the right word using hints from people in the level.
  • If you are stuck, try using a pen and paper to keep track of your die faces.
